name: Escape the Void (StraightUpGruntled)
description:
This game was created for the IndieTales Game Jam!

You are stranded on a planet that is dying from a dark corrupt force. Collect Gems and bring them back to your ship to fuel it's battery and escape before the Corruption seeps into you soul.

This game jam game is inspired by my main passion project called Vanquished, which you can check out here:

https://straightupgruntled.itch.io/vanquished

The game takes place within the same universe and story as Vanquished. I hope you enjoy!

Here are all of my Socials if you would like to check them out as well:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SGruntled

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/straightupgruntled

Discord: https://discord.gg/ht4ZWQzbG7
